QuestData.Title: A Gift of Hope
QuestData.Description:
Greetings, Maw Walker.
I bear a summons from the Winter Queen. She requests your presence in Ardenweald to witness a ceremony involving others from your world.
Shandris Feathermoon will be among them. You can find her in the Grove of Awakening.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Shandris Feathermoon in the Grove of Awakening.
